name: Goblin's Keep
description:
Goblin's Keep is a text-based game where you have to find you way in a dungeon.

Will you find the treasure without dying?

Credits:

Developer - Adriano Silva

Music author - Adan Quiroz
https://opengameart.org/users/adnadn

Icons - RAVENMORE
https://www.gamedevmarket.net/member/ravenmore-art/
